DOC.brief_summary: This pilot cohort study woman undergo focal ablation high-grade cervical intraepithelial neoplasia ( HGCIN ) . The cohort recruit UCSF Dysplasia Clinics . The standard treatment involve treatment entire cervix . Women HGCIN meeting inclusion criterion recruit enrollment pilot study focal treatment . Upon enrollment , underwent focal ablational treatment rather standard ablational treatment cervix . Follow-up visit conduct 2 week 6 month assess safety , feasibility , acceptability . The 6-month recurrence rate HGCIN calculate .
DOC.criteria: Age 2145 yo Biopsyconfirmed high grade cervical intraepithelial neoplasia grade 2 , 3 , 2/3 Satisfactory colposcopy , i.e. , entire transformation zone visible Lesion occupy < = 2 quadrant cervix . Unsatisfactory colposcopy . Colposcopic lesion extend endocervical canal beyond colposcopic visualization . Endocervical curettage positive highgrade cervical intraepithelial neoplasia . Suspicion invasive cancer colposcopic exam . Glandular dysplasia atypical glandular cell cytology . Unreliable followup . Immunosuppression ( HIV , transplant recipient , etc . )
